problem.markdown:
>>What is the best estimate for total number (in millions) of species on Earth? (give a whole number as your answer)<<
= 10 +- 2
[explanation] There are 2 million named species. The most common scientific estimate for total number of species on Earth is 10 million. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the best estimate for total number (in millions) of species on Earth? (give a whole number as your answer)
